attributes.action: Stop animals being caged and hunted for entertainment and sport.
attributes.additional_details: Promote good and ethical standards, put value at the heart of everything we do, put compassion in all our thoughts save the precious things that if allowed to be lost we will never regain and would be a poorer civilisation for it. Use our best ideas to strive forward in ways that enhance not decimate our planet and climate.
attributes.background: The current way we impact our planet is not sustainable, habitat loss and deforestation impact everyone. We must think and plan for our generations and the health of our planet.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about the hunting of animals for sport, habitat loss and deforestation but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle all of these issues.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
